subject.normal: Updated public XSL (FO) Disposition of Comments document

headers.subject: Updated public XSL (FO) Disposition of Comments document
headers.x-mimetrack: Itemize by SMTP Server on LORAX/DTW/ATI(Release 5.0.10 |March 22, 2002) at 02/21/2003 06:02:35 PM, Serialize by Router on LORAX/DTW/ATI(Release 5.0.10 |March 22, 2002) at 02/21/2003 06:02:52 PM, Serialize complete at 02/21/2003 06:02:52 PM

body.para: The public XSL (FO) Disposition of Comments document at http://www.w3.org/Style/XSL/2003/01/FO-DoC has just been updated with responses to your comments. If you are unsatisfied with the response, please feel free to post another comment to xsl-editors@w3.org.
Thank you for your interest in XSL FO and for your patience as we work our way through the comments.
body.footer: Paul Grosso for XSL FO Subgroup
